<script>
  $(document).ready(function(){ 
    el = $(".page-header > h1")
    icon = "rocket"
    text = el.text()
    text_new = "<span class=\"fa fa-" + icon  + "\"></span> " + text
    el.html(text_new) 
  }) ;
</script>
